summary: The diff only shows updates to metadata/documentation-style files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json). There is no evidence that the underlying static logo and favicon assets at the existing referenced paths were replaced, nor that the specific referencing files were preserved as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current site logo asset used in the Header and Maintenance screen with the provided existing logo (uploaded image `012.jpeg`) by regenerating the logo file at the exact path currently referenced by the app (`/assets/generated/logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png`).
missing_requirements.reason: No static asset replacement is shown in the diff summary, and no change indicates the logo image file at the required path was regenerated/replaced while keeping references unchanged.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the site favicon to match the provided existing logo (uploaded image `012.jpeg`) by regenerating the favicon file at the exact path currently referenced by the app (`/assets/generated/favicon-logo.dim_32x32.png`).
missing_requirements.reason: No static asset replacement is shown in the diff summary, and no change indicates the favicon file at the required path was regenerated/replaced while keeping references unchanged.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend feature/code changes (routing changes, removal of a nav item, new pages, styling updates, chat widget, NIFTY 50 ticker, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to replacing existing logo and favicon static assets without changing referenced paths or doing routing/code refactors. The diff summary text describes many unrelated modifications not requested.
